description: Distributed file storage protocol commonly used by Polygon dApps
It provides a serverless, distributed, peer-to-peer database for building decentralized applications
It allows developers to store, manage, and query structured data for decentralized applications using familiar SQL statements, with access control and ownership tied to the blockchain
It is a multi-party,decentralized database solution built on IPFS and Libp2p that provides an alternative architecture for data on the web
